entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
